column1: Cocaine comes as a white powder, which can be dissolved in water.

As a street drug, cocaine can be taken in different ways: - Inhaling it through the nose (snorting) - Dissolving it in water and injecting it into a vein (shooting up) - Mixing with heroin and injecting into a vein (speedballing) - Smoking it (this type of cocaine is called freebase or crack) Street names for cocaine include blow, bump, C, candy, Charlie, coca, coke, flake, rock, snow, speedball, toot.
